author: Adrian Collins
description:
It’s time to venture back into the Empire of the Wolf! The Scour by Richard Swan releases today, and if you’ve read Chapter 1 or followed Ed on his deep dive into this dark corner of the dark fantasy horror world, you know this needs to be on your bookshelf. In The Scour, a dark fantasy […]

The post The Scour by Richard Swan is out today! appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Scour by Richard Swan is out today!
